environment.title: Environment
environment.installMlxLmDesc: Will install mlx-lm (Apple Silicon training framework) in virtual environment using uv
environment.setupDesc: Will create a Python virtual environment and install mlx-lm training framework
environment.installUvDesc: Will download and install uv (fast Python package manager) from the official source
environment.uvInstallSuccess: uv installed successfully! You can now set up the Python environment.

about.title: About
about.description: Say Goodbye to Complexity, Easily Create Your AI Model

downloadSource.title: Model Download Source
downloadSource.desc: Choose the default source for online model downloads. Models will be automatically fetched from this source during training.
downloadSource.huggingfaceDesc: Default, may need VPN in China
downloadSource.modelscopeDesc: Direct access in China, fewer models
downloadSource.modelscopeWarn: ModelScope does not support MLX model auto-download. We recommend switching to "HF Mirror" for China acceleration + full model support.

storage.title: Storage
storage.modelPathsDesc: Custom scan paths for each model source. Leave empty to use system defaults.
storage.exportPathDesc: Output directory for Ollama model exports. Leave empty to use project directory.
